Context: The Centre for Health Sciences at George Brown College is seeking donations to support students. The donation will directly go towards student scholarships, and donors will receive a charitable tax receipt. Those who donate can also sign up to receive college news, application deadlines, event invitations, and tour information. The contact number for inquiries is 416-415-2000 (TTY: 1-877-515-5559), and the email address is ask.george@georgebrown.ca. It's important to note that information on the website is subject to change without notice, and students are responsible for verifying fee requirements.
